--- except.sql
GRAPH FinGraph
RETURN 1 AS x
EXCEPT ALL
RETURN 2 AS x

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 14,
          Name:    "FinGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLCompoundLinearQueryStatement{
        Op:            "EXCEPT",
        AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
        Statements:    []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturn{
                Return: 15,
                Items:  []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Star: -1,
                    Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                      ValuePos: 22,
                      ValueEnd: 23,
                      Base:     10,
                      Value:    "1",
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                      As:    24,
                      Alias: &ast.Ident{
                        NamePos: 27,
                        NameEnd: 28,
                        Name:    "x",
                      },
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
          &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
            Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
              &ast.GQLReturn{
                Return: 40,
                Items:  []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
                  &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                    Star: -1,
                    Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                      ValuePos: 47,
                      ValueEnd: 48,
                      Base:     10,
                      Value:    "2",
                    },
                    Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                      As:    49,
                      Alias: &ast.Ident{
                        NamePos: 52,
                        NameEnd: 53,
                        Name:    "x",
                      },
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH FinGraph RETURN 1 AS x EXCEPT ALL RETURN 2 AS x
